name: Gisburne's Castle
overview: Guy of Gisburne, treacherous henchman of the Sheriff of Nottingham, has captured Maid Marion. In his heavily defended castle, he holds her as bait. Become Robin of Foxley, the hooded man on a mission of rescue and vengeance. The game was originally published by Martech in 1984 and reissued in 1988 on the Ricochet label.
